name: cypress-api-automation-framework
description: Rest API testing using Cypress framework

scripts.cy:test:headed: npx cypress run --browser 'chrome' --headed --record --key 66f4d6d0-2b3c-49e1-aec1-6bad59590a3c  && sudo node cucumber-html-report.js
scripts.cy:test: npx cypress run --record --key 66f4d6d0-2b3c-49e1-aec1-6bad59590a3c  && sudo node cucumber-html-report.js
